project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Create a command-line Python tool to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functions for Celsius to Fahrenheit, Fahrenheit to Celsius, Celsius to Kelvin, Kelvin to Celsius, Fahrenheit to Kelvin, and Kelvin to Fahrenheit.
Create a command-line interface to accept user input for temperature value and desired output unit.
Write tests for each of the temperature conversion functions implemented above.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
